summary: This is an email forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330). The email includes a notice about the law office's remote work status due to COVID-19.

events.title: ECF Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim files a document electronically with the court regarding the U.S. v. Maxwell case, specifically mentioning 'Sleep Deprivation' in the attachment title.

keyFacts: The document is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330).
The email forwards a courtesy copy of an ECF filing with an attachment titled 'Letter re- Sleep Deprivation-4-29-2 I.pdf', suggesting a legal argument or motion related to sleep deprivation.
The email shows the defense legal team working remotely due to COVID-19 restrictions in April 2021.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case as of April 2021.
